text: Fun with Dick and June is a 1977 American comedy movie directed by Ted Kotcheff and starring Jane Fonda, George Segal, Ed McMahon, Richard Gautier, Allan Miller, Fred Willard, Anne Ramsey, Thayer David and Sean Frye. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures and was remade in 2005. ==Other websites== * * Category:1977 comedy movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Ted Kotcheff Category:1970s English-language movies Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:American heist movies Category:American satirical movies
title: Fun with Dick and Jane (1977 movie)
